actions.name: del
actions.text: It's not everyday that someone appears here.

actions.name: del
actions.text: I have a lot of names, you'll figure them out later.

actions.name: del
actions.text: But for now, call me Del.

actions.name: del
actions.text: That depends on which 'I' you're talking about...

actions.name: del
actions.text: If you mean the one right here, it doesn't have a name yet.

actions.name: del
actions.text: And if you mean the one outside the screen, I'll try to discover that.

actions.name: del
actions.text: That's what I asked you... You've just appeared out of nowhere.

actions.name: del
actions.text: Yeah, this is a game right?

actions.name: del
actions.text: That information is stored for as long as I can remember.

option.text: What kind of information do you have?
Who told you this is a game?
Who told you this is a game?
